person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

2. Leeds

These are the two teams mentioned in the paragraph, and they can be identified as entities representing football clubs or persons associated with those clubs.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

2. Leeds (representing the football club or the people associated with it)

These are the entities that clearly refer to persons or groups of people. The numbers (0) and (. ) are not entities and can be ignored.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
